text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
...Seems like she didn't hear at all. Oh well.
Oh, she's doing it.

Mikoto, good work.
Can I talk to you for a moment?
Hey, Mikoto~
Mikoto!
...Producer? Sorry, I didn't notice.
Haha, your concentration is as impressive as ever.

I have to concentrate when practicing,
or else I won't improve...
That's true. It suits you, Mikoto.

But how about taking a short break?
We also want to discuss work.
Look, I brought some drinks as refreshments.
...Yeah, got it. I'll take one.

────So, regarding the number of dancers,
there's been some adjustments.
It seems like there will be a bit fewer than planned.

Isn't the stage looking too empty?
That's the issue.

Yeah... so we'll need to consult with
the choreographer...
For now, we plan to cover the stage with sets and direction.
...No, it's okay.

If we can perfect the choreography we're doing now,
we can add even more flashy dances.
So, we should increase the number of dance lessons a bit more...

Mikoto, the choreographer said that the
choreography we're doing now is perfect, didn't they?

You don't have to push yourself so hard,
we still have plenty of time until the live.

...I have to keep doing it until I can do it
perfectly at any time.

If I do it halfway, I don't think I'll be
able to do it well...
...I absolutely don't want to fail.

Mikoto... I understand. In that case,
I won't force you to stop, but...

Make sure to stay hydrated and take
appropriate breaks, okay?
Your health is the most important thing, Mikoto.
I understand... I'll do that.

Oh, and for Mikoto's fans too,
take care of yourself for their sake.
I'm a fan of Mikoto too, so I worry about her.
Producer? Is that so...

I don't want to disappoint my fans...
I don't want that either.
I'll make sure to take proper breaks.

Ah...
Mikoto, are you going to resume the lesson?
Yeah, thanks for the refreshments, Producer.
(...Her passion for being an idol is truly exceptional.)

(Alright, I have to support Mikoto
so she can do her best!)
